snippet.title: How Noise-canceling Headsets Work: Noise-canceling Headset Parts
snippet.description: A noise-canceling headset uses earpieces in addition to the microphone to help with hearing. Learn more about the parts of a noise-canceling headset.. the microphone is the most complicated part of a noise-canceling headset, there are other features to consider. The headset can either include a single earpiece...

snippet.title: How Noise-canceling Headsets Work: Noise-canceling Headset Technology
snippet.description: Noise-canceling headset technology combines two microphones into one to help hearing. Learn more about noise-canceling headset technology here...How does the headset know which noise is your voice and what noise to cancel?
